Participants.evidence: adult patients older than 18 years old who underwent CF-LVAD implantation

Objective.evidence: Our study aims at identifying potential predictors of intraoperative bleeding

Number_Analysed.evidence: A total of 208 patients were included in the analysis

Result_Outcome.evidence: Multilogistic regression analysis showed that artery bypass grafting pre-LVAD (odds ratio [OR] 2.98, confidence interval [CI] 1.2-7.42, p = 0.01) and temporary mechanical assist device pre-LVAD (OR 3.67, 95%CI 1.72-7.85, p < 0.001) were independent predictors of intraoperative bleeding
